ComicInfo.Title: Prog 2403
ComicInfo.Summary:
BORAG THUNGG, EARTHLETS! Behold the works of my Mighty Self — I am Tharg, and I bring you the gift of Thrill-power!
A new Judge Dredd thriller joins the line-up this prog as Ken Niemand and Silvia Califano collaborate on Hater, a tale that shows that even though the Apocalypse War was forty-two years ago, its victims are still suffering the consequences.
Elsewhere, there’s more metropolitan mayhem in Nightmare New York, high-octane action on the battlefields of Nu Earth in Rogue Trooper, galactic shenanigans in The Out, and a desperate manhunt in Brink — in other words, yet more circuit-shattering excitement from the most scrotnig comic on the shelves. Accept no substitutes — this is zarjazosity at its very finest!
Also new from the House of Tharg is the second volume of the collected Fiends of the Eastern Front, which you can pick up from all good Thrill-merchants and shop.2000AD.com (indeed, the webshop edition comes with an exclusive new cover from DaNi), and features stories from the Edginton and Trevallion droids such as Constanta and 1963.
Get up to speed on the vampire before he returns in the Xmas prog!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-10-13 05:26:42. [CVDB1073322]
ComicInfo.Writer: Dan Abnett, Ian Edginton, Kenneth Niemand
